Article.Title: TODO - Best Practices
Article.Content:
Recommendation to developers

Add the name of the webshop to the HTTP header "User-Agent", when you send a request to the service. Preferably also the name of webshop provider if applicable.

If you have a registered user at fraktguide.bring.no, please also include XML API's Public ID parameter in the query. This makes it possible for us to send any relevant messages via the registered e-mail address.

Error Handling

NB! Remember to use timeout and error handling when making requests to the service. Handle errors in a way that is satisfactory for your online store, see Error codes.

Error Handling Strategies:

Use the """offline data to calculate price, or

Set a fixed standard price of the package

Note that if a package is out of coverage area or are too big / heavy to send, the Shipping Guide may not offer any products for sending and thus gives an empty answer set. Remember to add a default handling of this case.
